Package com.day.cq.mailer.email

Interface EmailTemplate<Type extends Email>

  • Type Parameters:
    Type - Type of email
    All Superinterfaces:

    public interface EmailTemplate<Type extends Email>
extends MessageTemplate<Type>
    Define a Template that can be used to build Emails.
